options: ['Because many boys and girls are wearing the same kinds of clothes, so it is hard to tell whether a child is a boy or a girl in western countries.', 'Because many of them have long hair.', 'They all go to the same school.', 'A or B']
questions: Why is it difficult to tell whether a child is a boy or a girl in western countries?
article:
One day, an old man went(go)for a walk in a park in Washington, and when he was(is) tired, he sat(sit) down on a bench . A young person  was standing on the other side of the pond .
"My goodness" the old man said(say)to the person sitting next to him on the bench."Do you see the person with loose pants "and long hair? Is it a boy or a girl?"
"A girl," said the person sitting next to the old man. "She's my daughter."
"Oh!" the old man said quickly, "please excuse me. I didn't know that you are her mother."
"I'm not her mother," said the person."I'm her father!"
